main event: On April 7, 1966, multiple observers reported seeing an unidentified flying object in South Macon, Georgia.
interesting points: The object was initially noticed as a bright colored red light moving from the west southwest to east over Macon,The object appeared to hover almost still for about five minutes before continuing on its path,The sky was cloudy at the time of the sighting,The report indicates no experience in astronomy or meteorology among the observers,There was no recorded aircraft in flight at the time of the sighting.
sighted object: unidentified flying object (reported as a bright colored red light)
witness description: Civilians including a retired railroad employee and a tower operator at Macon Municipal Airport
